inn1.comm: holding its line and lifting from a good length outside off, where Smith reaches with a big shuffle to defend
nearly 140 kph as he gets it to climb from a fuller length now, moving away late, Smith beaten on the push
good length this time, lots of bounce, but Smith watchful enough to let it go early
slightly fuller now, but Smith has decided to let a few go alone, not a bad idea, with away swing and the carry
massive away swing, like an offbreak gone crazy in top gear, Smith has made the right decision to be cautious early, and he shoulders arms once more as it pitches full outside off
straighter now, but well outside off and merits one more leave
Junaid gets the sharp carry straight away, beginning as he does on a length across the right hander who leaves

and next ball he rips it on the stumps, good length, and it catches Amla on the pad, also convinces the umpire enough to raise the finger. South Africa will review this, and replays show it pitched just outside leg stump, and that will ensure Amla stays
137.9 kph and troubling Amla once again, it has come in just enough after pitching on a length to take a thick inside edge as Amla plants the front leg across
moves across once more and pings extra cover with a crisp push
ends up outside off stump with the shuffle and lets a good length ball go past, fine carry again, tight lines again, Pakistan starting with lots of discipline
slight width now, and Amla is flashing those wrists immediately, needing point to dive to save what could have been four
straightens outside off stump, Smith follows the line and defends away from the body
and already we see signs of impatience from the South Africans, Smith backs away to a length ball not far from off stump, and flays it down to third man
overpitched outside off stump and Smith happily turns it through square leg, as if that was the easiest and most natural thing to do for a batsman
lifter outside off stump, smith will have a look and leave it

he's decided to play it this time, away from the body too, he'd been leaving them alone decently, but hopped across way outside off to defend this one from Irfan which bounced, took the inside edge, and it proved to be a fatal one for Smith
whipped off the pad down to fine leg
gets across and behind the line of a length ball to defend
tailed in this one, but after passing the left-hander outside off stump
lovely, good length, and straightened just enough to zoom past the outside edge as Ingram pushed from the crease
bangs it in back of a length, coming into Ingram, who brings it down onto the pitch
width there to punch off the back foot, but Ingram finds no timing on it, and point fields
left alone outside off stump
on the pads and worked down to fine leg
bouncer carries down leg with the angle
that is a fine leave, this one just takes off from short of a length, it is not far from off and is also holding its line, wouldn't have been wise to push at that
but Ingram does push this time, probably the fuller length makes him do that, these are wonderful areas from Pakistan, Ingram is beaten as the the ball straightens once more
lots of lift for the umpteenth time today, helps that it is a touch wider outside off, and Ingram is able to spot that and let it go
stinging response, Ingram confidently forward to a pitched up delivery and even as it straightens, he dispatches it through extra cover with a cracker of a connection
Amla moves across, and works it off the stumps through square leg
could have gone for the cut on that one, there was some width, but with the kind of lift these men are getting, leaving was the much better option, Ingram lets it go
wow, yet another tester, 136.5 kph, holding its line from short of a length, and going past Ingram's throat as he hops in the hope of blocking it
length ball played out to the leg side
solid punch off the back foot, but he hits the length ball straight to mid off
ending just outside off with the incoming angle from over the stumps, pushed down the pitch
Amla drives down the pitch, Irfan gets himself down from the stratosphere, gets on his knees and uproots Amla's leg stump with an accurate throw, batsman in the crease well in time
what a riposte from Amla, sends a good length delivery screaming through extra cover with a half forward push
defends a back of a length ball to leg
another boundary, leans towards this length ball on the pads and his wrists send it racing wide of the man at fine leg
gets behind the line to block a length ball
moves just outside off, and opens the face to push towards covers
he walks out now, and turns it to short midwicket
moves across outside off and turns it through square leg for one
Amla covers the line of off and pushes a good length ball to midwicket
rare width this morning from Pakistan, but Amla's punch is straight to cover
understandably tentative to get forward to Irfan, who might even get a half-volley to rear up, who knows, nudges this pitched up delivery to leg from the crease
pushed solidly towards cover
coming in with the angle from that in-between length, played out to leg, which is about all you can do at the moment
they have hit some lovely boundaries, these two, Ingram this time uses the little width available to punch it, on his toes, through cover-point
fullish offcutter now, quietly patted to the leg side
down to third man for a single
length ball turned to forward square leg
they have started providing width more often now, but Ingram is unable to make this one count, as a cut crashes into point's hands
beaten, pitched up, wide delivery, Ingram eagerly goes for a big drive
punch off the back foot, to extra cover
wide, quite wide, but Ingram has again failed to take advantage, as he's bashed it to point
and could have gone for four first ball, had a cut not been saved by a diving Hafeez at backward point, quite wide one to start with
looks to hook a short one into the body, it comes on slower than he expected and he adjusts to knock it fine down leg
whipped off the pads through midwicket, man runs around from deep square
they go for a sharp single after a push to cover, Ingram makes it even as the throw misses
Smith-esque shuffle outside off and takes it from off stump and turns it to midwicket for one
worked to midwicket
that took off, Amla awkwardly brings it down with a thick inside edge onto the leg side from outside off
for once, Ingram makes use of the width from Junaid, and punches wide of the sweeper
good one, this one has come in from a good length, and beaten the inside edge of a loose drive away from the body
worked down ti fine leg off the pad
opens the face to a slower one and runs it to point
stays in the crease and defends a length ball on off
gets on top of the bounce and punches, to point
144.9 kph back of a length wide ball almost produces a wicket, Ingram's punch nearly carries to Hafeez at backward point
146.2 kph and dug in short outside off now, Ingram lets it be
145.7 kph, superb pace from Riaz, nice tight line around off stump, he runs it to third man
pitched up at 145 kph, and Amla pings short extra with a front foot push
137.8 kph length ball pushed into the pitch
pitched up into the pads and worked down to fine leg
low dipping full toss at 135 kph, Amla adjusts to pat it away to midwicket
Amla's wrists send this one scooting past midwicket from outside off stump

Irfan's bounce has claimed another batsman, would have been a routine work to square leg off a short of a length delivery, had it not reared up at Ingram and popped up behind the wicket off the leading edge, for Kamran to take one of the easiest catches he's taken
opens the face and runs a length ball down to third man
they come back for a tight second after AB turns it behind square leg, Irfan not the quickest
bounces at 146.7 kph outside off, and AB adjusts to weave out of the line and dab it to third man
length ball driven to sweeper cover
145.8 kph good length ball zipping away with the angle outside off, left alone
shortish and down the pads, AB swivels to pull it very fine off an underedge
moves across and defends close to the pitch
pushed to backward point
slower one pitched up at 126 kph, Amla meets it eagerly forward and sends it wide of mid on for one
length ball dabbed down to third man
already standing around off before the ball is bowled, gets a thick inside edge backward of square leg
overpitched delivery driven to extra cover
overpitched and wider this time, AB makes it count with a slap to the deep extra cover rope
de Villiers was a long way up the pitch before they decided to go for the single, Amla had pushed one towards point and was not sure, throw misses at striker's end anyway
moves across and dabs it in the region of third man
tiny gap between short backward point and point, but Amla has picked it with a drive, which is cut off by third man near the rope
walks a long way outside off stump, and defends a length ball down the pitch
short of a length ball worked to midwicket
finds some bounce instantly from a good length and beats AB as he tries to cut
straightens as well as bounces now, AB hit high on the thigh pad on the forward push
pushes a 96.5 kph delivery back to the bowler
slower tossed up legbreak now driven through point
leading edge, but it loops comfortably over the bowler, as Amla looks to turn a full and quick one to leg
driven down to long off
shot, fabulous placement from Amla, there is a sweeper in the deep, he's not far but Amla's timing through point is so good it beats him by a fair distance

dropped, Hafeez has saved some runs today at backward point, but he's put down a straightforward chance for that position, Amla's push was straight to him, he got body behind the line, both hands to the ball, all in vain
Amla restrains himself and runs a length ball to third man along the ground
pushes it wide outside off stump, AB has a drive but cannot reach it
thick inside edge behind square on leg for a single
coming in from back of a length and Amla gets a big inside edge now, which is too quick for Kamran to change direction and reach in time
tossed up, driven to sweeper cover off the front foot
whipped from the crease behind square leg
turned wide of the sweeper through point
chipped in the air but falls way short of long off
worked through square leg, big chase for Jamshed from deep square leg, and South Africa push for the third, and get it
too wide, too flat, and hammered to the deep extra cover boundary, no chance for the man in the deep
tossed up, worked with the spin past midiwicket's dive
flatter, turned to deep midwicket from the crease
whipped neatly but straight to square leg
he stands outside off, and nudges it from there to fine leg
walks across and whips with the turn to fine leg
wristily turned to the man at deep midwicket
thick inside edge to midwicket as he looks to push to the off side
straightens on middle and leg, turned to deep square
short and flat, pushed down to long on
floated up full and Amla drives it long off to bring up his fifty, how much is that drop going to cost Pakistan?
moves outside off and drives with the spin to wide long on
loud appeal for lbw as it spins to catch him on the pad, near the top of the flap, too high and too much angle
whipped to deep square leg with the spin
already stands outside off, lets it turn from good length, and picks it out to deep square
punched back to the bowler
pushed straight down the ground, long on comes around
punched through point, sweeper's turn to cover ground now
punched straight to extra cover
flat and quick, whipped out to deep square
cut wide of sweeper cover and they come back for the second
cut to the other side of the sweeper this time, and AB continues to pick up runs easily
full, pushed down to deep midwicket
played to long on off the front foot
lovely wrists from Amla as he whips to deep midwicket
comes down the track, Hafeez shortens it, and AB finds midwicket
bat around front pad to work it to deep square
driven straight to extra cover
paddled down to fine leg with the turn
has him guessing in the crease with a flighted delivery, thick inside edge as he pushes at it
punches a length ball, Ajmal runs to his right and fields
overpitched delivery lapped in the air to fine leg
tossed up delivery on middle and leg whipped to fine leg
flatter one, spins in, punched to long on
worked down to fine leg with the spin
good length again, out to deep square now
pushes it quick down the leg side, Kamran fails to gather
and first ball with the changed angle, AB gets down to reverse-sweep and picks up four through backward point
flat one pushed to long on
long on in business once more
walks outside off and works to square leg
bounce from a good length but going down leg and turned square
pushed to point for another easy single
shout for lbw as he paddles from outside off stump, probably hit outside the line of off
pushes for one to extra cover
guided to point
worked to the leg side with the spin
swept hard and too much for the man at fine leg, that is another fifty for AB
punched to long on
nudged in front of square leg for a sharp single
pushes a tossed up ball to the bowler
walks across, and nudges it fine off middle stump
swept down wide of fine leg
Amla skips out and lofts, that is timed so well, that despite seeming to be only a push, it carries on and on, over the long off boundary
punched down to long on
turned square off the pads
starts with a 135 kph bouncer that a shuffling Amla awkwardly avoids, too bad it's a front foot no ball
swings at a slower short ball now, and it rolls to off after hitting him, superb start to the new spell from Junaid
dabbed down to the keeper's right
all timing, all fabulous timing, nothing wrong with the length delivery, but AB's created room with a twirl of the wrists and neither point nor third man have a sniff at stopping that
into the pads now, good length, turned square, fielders converge on the ball, but AB has enough legs to make it back, helps that the throw is weak
dabs a short ball going across him, to third man
Amla uses the slight width on this back of a length ball to run it fine past the keeper, beats third man comfortably
looked to be the doosra as he lunges forward and gets a leading edge to the off side
hit on the pads with a quick offbreak as he fails to work it to leg
flat and moving across the right-hander, swatted to long on
offbreak turned to deep midwicket off the pad
another doosra, as he pops it up on the off side in trying to work to leg
tight single after a push to midwicket
runs it straight to short third man
driven down to long off
tossed up, slapped off the front foot to long off
fine leg is up, and AB goes on the knees to sweep a flat delivery in the air, over that man and into the boundary
opens the face and drives out to sweeper cover
Afridi continues to go for runs, a single to long off now
in the air for a while but between the bowler and midwicket for one
pushed back to the bowler
turns it down leg from round the stumps
worked to deep square leg past the umpire
whipped wide of deep square and they will come back for two more
behind square leg again, how neatly they have milked that region
pops up on the leg side as he pushes forward
slapped away to extra cover
chipped in the air past extra cover to wide long off
opens the face to one angled in full and picks one to sweeper cover
does not get hold of the cut but a single is on to sweeper cover
full toss hit straight to midiwicket
can't get the run again, guides it straight to point
short of a length on the off, whips it through midwicket for a single
AB trying to reverse-pull that delivery, short and he missed out, was struck on the waist, was hoping to go over short fine
fullish on middle and quicker, pushed away to midwicket
tries to go over point this time, attempts a reverse-swipe over point and he misses out again
clips that off the front foot through to deep square leg for a single
shortish on middle, pushed away off the back foot through to deep midwicket for a single
drops that short and Amla moves well across to whip that to the fine-leg boundary, struck him on the thighs as he tried to play that fine
a touch too wide there and Amla has to reach for that one and misses, called a wide
full on the pads and he clips that away through square leg into the deep for a couple of runs
way too wide this time outside off and the umpire stretches his arms
down the leg side but that's not called a wide, in fact it went over the stumps as Amla moved across
fullish outside off, tries to square-drive that through point, misses
angling in towards middle, dug out towards midwicket, Amla calls for a single and makes it in time, Junaid Khan flips a throw from midwicket but Amla would have been in
superb from AB, had made up his mind there, moved across, bent low and played the ramp shot over short fine leg and fell over while doing so, but didn't lose control of the shot
floating it on leg stump, turned away past square leg into the deep for a single
fires it down the leg side and it's called a wide
thrashed, slower through the air, shuffled across, that was slightly short and he smacked it hard between deep square leg and short fine
short, quicker this time, pulls this one in front of square for a single
flat and wide and Amla cashes in, cuts it away through point for a boundary, runs being scored with ease here
flighted on leg stump, turned into the leg side for a single
punched towards extra cover, dot ball this time

tossed up on the off, turns it away through midwicket for a single, that's his 11th ODI ton, he averages more than 57 in ODI cricket, that's something. It's his first ODI ton at the Wanderers, lovely knock
AB continues his merry way, big gaps in the outfield on the off side, turns in, it's short, he moves away and punches that over the infield for a one-bounce four
that's been bowled down the leg side, and it's called a wide
flighted on middle, made room and crunched it along the ground but straight to extra cover
that's disappeared, AB is going for everything here, flatter on middle and he slog-swept that hard over the deep square leg boundary, a short boundary there and it's sent miles

this is an even better shot, superb timing this time, short, made room, this was bowled on middle and leg and he just lofted that over extra cover, that went some distance as well, this is a ruthless assault
gets on the back foot and knocks it away into the leg side for a single, was limping a little as he completed the run there, must be cramps
a single to AB, he moves on to 99
Amla goes over extra cover, his turn to attack this time, makes a bit of room, that landed on a length outside off and Amla thrashed that

fullish outside leg stump and Amla was struck on the pads, Ajmal was convinced it is out as he tried to turn the face and missed, the umpire didn't think so, they have decided to review it, the impact was outside leg stump, though it hit him on the full, and Hot Spot shows there was some contact with the bat as well before it struck the pads, Not out
gets forward and turns that towards midwicket
forces that off the front foot towards midwicket, AB's on 99
three dot balls for AB, slower through the air, gets on the back foot and pushes it to the bowler
flat on middle, defended wide of extra cover for a single
cut away, that's four, shortish outside off and he beat that gap between point and short third man, a superb century from the captain
that is among the flattest of sixes, short and he makes room to thwack that over the cover point boundary, brute force there, AB's not going to hold back
flighted outside off, drives it straight to extra cover this time
shortish outside off, slaps that to deep cover for a single
Amla's turn to go big now, tossed up outside off and he launches into that one through the line to deposit it over long-off, Pakistan are being smacked around here
pushes that off the front foot towards cover
gets on the back foot and works it through square leg for a single
struck really hard, flatter but bowled on a length, he moves across and cracks that hard past the bowler, past mid-off, for a boundary
swept hard towards deep square leg for just the single
slower one through the air bowled outside off, tapped wide of point for a single
swept that one straight to short fine, there is a misfield but no run conceded
full outside off and AB steers that towards deep point for a single
that landed in front of deep cover, pitched up and he went over the top, was aiming to go over extra cover but didn't strike it as well
full toss way outside off stump and that's been called a wide
low full toss on the off, driven towards mid-off, who is on the edge of the circle, for a single
low full toss again, pushes it through to extra cover for a single

missed run-out, struck straight to mid-on and AB calls for a single, was struggling to make it to the other end, was limping due to cramps, Younis aims and misses, he's usually good at scoring direct hits
another full toss and another wide outside off, too many extras from Pakistan
a bouncer but too high, banged in and it went well over his head, another wide
aiming for a yorker and that's been guided past point into the deep for a single
flays that into the deep on the off side for a single
swings and misses, that didn't miss the leg stump by much, was bowled at 138kmph, tried to clear midwicket there but did not make contact
on a length on middle and pushes it to mid-on for a quick single
fullish on middle and leg, turns it towards square leg for a single
fullish outside off, squeezed through to deep cover for a single, this is a good over
Amla tries to scoop that over short fine but isn't successful, gets a leg-bye in the off side
another wide, well outside off, Pakistan are not helping themselves here
Amla has spooned a catch to extra cover, pitched on a length and he can't get it past the fielder, an easy catch and it ends a record stand
a single into the off side to get off the mark
full toss on middle, turned into the leg side for a single
Faf gets across and turns it wide of midwicket for a single, they get more runs through overthrows as Saeed Ajmal throws at the non-striker's end from midwicket and misses
angling in towards middle, whipped towards midwicket, there is a misfield and they steal a single
that's fortunate, he was aiming to go over extra cover but managed to slice that over point, there's a big gap there and it fetches him a boundary
bowled on a length, AB tries to smash that through extra cover, ends up mistiming it to the bowler
AB goes over point this time, slices it over the fielder into the deep for three more runs
shortish on the off, drags it past square leg for just the single
length ball and he goes over the top of mid-off, just clears the fielder, didn't strike it well enough, two more
made a bit of room to drive that through midwicket, got an inside edge onto the pads there
that's been swung hard, angling in, bowled in the spot on middle and AB smacks that through midwicket and mid-on for a boundary, 300 up for South Africa
tossed up on middle, turns it behind square for a single
low full toss on leg stump, AB reverse-sweeps that straight to short third

AB goes, goes for the slog-sweep but gets a top-edge tried to clear midwicket, it got far enough to reach deep midwicket where Shoaib Malik judged it well, keeping his eyes on it and diving to his left to complete the catch
worked away through square leg into the deep for a single
slightly short on middle and leg, played away into the leg side for one more
pushed that one down the ground to long-on for a single
four, streaky, pitched up and he tries to go hard down the ground, gets a thick edge wide of the keeper for a boundary
dead straight from du Plessis, it helps that the ball is bowled in the slot on middle but he just smacked that through the line, over the bowler's head for a straight six
on the pads and du Plessis will feel he missed out there with the fine leg up, but that was also bowled quick, struck on the pads, no run
six more, on a length and Faf goes over deep midwicket, makes a bit of room and connects well to clear the ropes
that's another four, fuller from Riaz, du Plessis tried to drive that, got a thick edge again past the keeper to beat third man
not a wide, had made a lot of room there and that was full, tried to smack that over point, missed
short on the off and Behardien drags that hard towards mid-on, no single on offer there
pitched up and that's struck back hard towards Junaid, just the single as he manages to get his body behind that one
that's absolutely hammered, pitched up and he creams that between mid-off and extra cover for a boundary
full on middle and leg, clipped towards deep square leg for a single
aiming at the stumps, Behardien tries to go over the top, gets an inside edge onto the pads, just the single
shortish on middle, pulled towards fine leg for a single
that's a horrible delivery with the fine leg inside the circle, on the pads and that's been whipped over the fine-leg boundary for a flat six
low full toss outside off, chips that towards mid-off for a single
Behardien collects it from outside off and clips it uppishly over square leg for a couple of runs
gets a single, on a length and that's chipped wide of mid-off for a single
caught at mid-off, struck hard but can't get it past Younis, fired on middle and that was driven through but was in the air and found the fielder
tries to scoop that from outside off but misses, gets a leg-bye

inn2.comm: short of a good length, nips back in a touch, gets on the back foot and defends it to the bowler
struck on the pads as he tries to work it square, struck high on the pads as it moved back in, may have gone down leg and may have gone over the stumps as well
goodish length this time, comes back in, gets on the front foot and turns it towards midwicket
slightly short of a good length, rocks on the back foot and plays it to extra cover
short of a good length on middle, rocks back and turns it towards midwicket
goodish length, starts off with a maiden, gets on the back foot and pushes it towards mid-off
bowls that one full on middle and it's been pushed towards mid-off from the crease
width and Hafeez goes after that one, slices it over point wide of third man for a couple of runs
goodish length in the channel outside off, leaves that one alone to the keeper
superbly done at extra cover who got a hand to it, pitched on a good length and that's driven well but extra cover dives to his right and saves a certain boundary, just the single
beautiful shot from Jamshed, pitched up and he launches that one over extra cover, came off the meat, minimum effort there, one bounce over the ropes
driven back soundly towards the bowler, Tsotsobe gets his hand to it in time as he bends down and saves a few runs
angling in towards middle, clips that one towards square leg from the crease
short of a good length, moves back in from outside off, gets an inside edge onto the pads
gets on the back foot and whips it uppishly through midwicket for a couple of runs
goodish length, gets forward and guides that towards point, dives to save the single but there's a slight fumble, Pakistan decide not to go for one
on a good length and moving away, shoulders arms to that one
angling in towards middle, gets on the back foot and pushes it towards midwicket
on a good length on the off stump, rocks forward and pushes it back towards the bowler
slightly short outside off and it's crunched on the bounce towards point
that's six, Jamshed swivels to that short ball and picks it up cleanly over short fine for a maximum
on a good length, gets across and drives that through the line towards mid-off
slightly short on the off, gets on the back foot and pushes it to cover

Jamshed's gone, early strike for South Africa, that was bowled on a length and Jamshed looked to clear mid-off there but couldn't get it past Amla, just a chip, needed more than that, straight to the fielder
Hafeez goes hard at that one, gets a thick outside edge, there is a slip in place and it goes well past him to beat third man
angling in towards middle, pushed wide of midwicket but mid-on cuts it off
nicely struck, short of a length and he gets on top of that one to crack it wide of a diving point for four
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and pushes it to cover
punched off the back foot wide of mid-off for a single
off the mark, pushed off the back foot towards third man for a single
rocks forward and defends that one towards extra cover, no run on offer there
well fielded at gully, shortish and that's guided in the direction of third man, Ingram dives full length to his left to save the single
again, dives to his left and palms that one towards the slips
plenty of width there, Akmal chases that one and thrashes it through point on the up for a boundary
gets front and across and turns it wide of short fine leg for a single
on a good length, gets on the back foot and plays it towards point
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and pushes it to point
back of a length, he gets on the back foot and knocks it down towards point
Akmal had made his mind up there, banged in short outside off and he slaps that hard over mid-off for a boundary, not very attractive but he was in control
slower one outside off, cut away towards third man for a single
back of a length outside off, punched towards extra cover, who is on the edge of the circle
short and he seizes the length early, pulled away superbly through midwicket, gets on the back foot and punishes it, Akmal and Hafeez are going well here
shortish outside off, pulls it wide of mid-on, didn't get hold of it but was safe, a couple more
beaten, goodish length outside off, tries to open the face on that one, misses as it moves away
pitched up on a length and he drives it towards mid-off
short and wide and there's plenty of room to play that shot, cut over point comfortably for four more, poor ball from Tsotso
goodish length outside off, defended towards point
goodish length, gets across and pushes it wide of midwicket for a single
angling in towards the off stump, defended towards cover
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and punches it towards cover
pitched up this time, he square-drives that one but can't get it past point
slightly short outside off, crunches that one off the back foot and plays it to cover
that one moved back in, tried to drive it hard, but slightly outside the line, the ball nipped back in to go past the inside edge
slightly short outside off, pushes it towards cover off the back foot
good length on the off, gets forward and pushes it to cover
slightly short outside off, crunches it from the crease towards point
how did that miss? Short and he tried to chop that, almost ended up chopping it back on to his stumps, inside edge and it rolls over the fine-leg boundary
made a bit of room there and smacked it over the bowler's head, didn't connect it well but still got three, McLaren gives chase and dives and rolls it back in
rocks forward and taps it down towards cover from the crease
guides that one down to third man for a single to keep strike
short of a good length outside off, pushes it off the back foot towards mid-on
short of a length and he goes for a pull, wants to pull it square but misses, is struck in the midriff
pitches it short and Akmal mistimes a hook there, lands safe, gets a single
gets across a little to that good length delivery and pushes it back to the bowler
appeal for lbw, angling in towards leg stump and perhaps would have gone further down, may have just clipped leg stump but would have been the umpire's call had it been reviewed
pulled away, picked the length early, a fraction short and Hafeez was in position early to dispatch that through midwicket
slightly slower from Tsotso, lands on leg stump, gets across and defends it to the bowler
on a good length, gets forward and defends that one towards point, no single on offer there
drops that short, slower in the air, pulled towards deep square leg for a single
slower one bowled full outside off, pushes it wide of cover for a single
slower one, held it back this time, tried to cut it hard, missed
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and works it wide of midwicket for a single
swings it hard, fetches it from outside off and drags it hard past midwicket for a boundary, was in the air for a while but safe in the end, the partnership is now worth 51
short and wide and it seemed like a shot was on, tried to cut it past point did Kamran and missed
drops it into the off side and steals a quick single
superbly hit, lovely sound as he hit it, pitched on a length and he drove it hard through the line past mid-off
back of the hand there, attempted legcutter, short and Hafeez tries to chop that behind point, missed
slightly short on the off, drops that one towards point from the crease
floating it on the off stump, pushed to extra cover
drives that one down to long-off for a single
gets forward and taps it towards point
comes down the track, not quite there to the pitch, and defends it into the off side
reverse-sweeps that one towards point
sees him come down, he drops it short, played wide of midwicket for a single
shortish outside off, gets on the back foot and punches it through cover

missed run-out, mix-up, Hafeez tapped that into the off side and raced off, but the response from Kamran Akmal was late, it was too late by the time he sent it back but Hafeez was fortunate the throw from du Plessis at the striker's end was wayward
banged in short on middle and Hafeez tries to pull, gets a top edge and it sails over the ropes behind third man
shortish outside off, cracks it towards point from the crease
pitched up and that's struck hard, but straight to deep cover for a single
drops it short outside leg stump, tries to help it on its way fine, misses, called a wide
slower legcutter, smacked towards deep cover for a single
swept that one from the off stump towards deep square leg for a single
shortish on middle, makes a bit of room and punches it towards cover
goes big, bowled it flat outside off, comes down the track and smashes it hard over the long-on boundary
that's another one, flat on middle, rocks back and thrashes it flat over the deep midwicket boundary, half-century for Hafeez, the chase is on track
slightly short outside off, cuts it towards point
gets front and across and pushes it wide of mid-on for a single
slightly short on the off, appeared to move back in a little, defended past cover for a quick single
slower one bowled on a good length, pushes that one back to the bowler
ooh, that didn't miss the leg stump by much, moved across to play it fine, missed
Kamran goes! Bowled it slow and short outside off, a slower bouncer, Kamran tried to upper cut that past the keeper, got a thin edge straight to AB
bowled it full outside off, digs it out wide of cover for a single
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and pushes it towards midwicket
slightly short outside off, makes room and cuts it towards point
floating it on the off, gets forward and pushes it towards mid-on
takes it from middle and sweeps it towards deep square leg for a single
appeal for a run-out, pushed it back to the bowler, Peterson collects and hits the stumps direct, but AB knocked the stumps down before the ball made contact, either way Hafeez was in
sliding down leg, tries to sweep it fine, just gets the single, a leg-bye
comes down the track and drives it past midwicket for a single
short of a good length, gets a thick outside edge wide of a diving point, it moved away to square him up a bit
slower one bowled fuller, driven back to the bowler, McLaren dives to his left, collects, save the single and flips back a throw to the striker's end
shortish outside off, drops it down behind point for a single
slightly short outside off, guides that towards third man for a single
angling in towards middle, chops it down towards point from the crease
angling in towards middle, drives it towards midwicket, can't get it past the fielder
floating it on middle, comes down the track and drives it towards wide long-on for a single
short and that's punished, rocks on the back foot and smashes that long hop to the deep midwicket boundary
takes it from middle, sweeps it down towards deep square leg for a single

Big wicket, Hafeez holes out to long-off, bowled flatter outside off, came down the track and connected well but didn't get the desired elevation, struck it flat down Dale Steyn's throat at long-off, he moved a couple of paces to his left and judged that well
floating it outside off, reaches forward and pushes it towards cover
an awkward sweep from Younis, gets it fine for a single
short of a good length outside off, makes a bit of room and guides that one down to third man for a single
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and turns it away behind square for a single
dropped it short and that's well struck, it's important to get these boundaries coming, gets on the back foot and pulls it hard through square leg
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and punches it towards midwicket
punches it off the back foot towards deep cover
pitched up outside off and that's been driven well, creamed through the covers for a boundary, superbly timed

shortish outside off, makes room to cut, gets an inside edge onto the stumps, was perhaps too close to cut, he tried to pierce the infield there to a delivery bowled fairly straight and held its line, Pakistan in trouble now
comes down the track does Malik and taps it into the off side
shortish on leg stump, tries to whip it through square leg, struck high on the pads
gets on the back foot and pushes it wide of midwicket for a single
bowling it straight, gets an inside edge onto the pads as he tries to defend
angling it from round the wicket towards middle, tapped into the leg side
pushes it on a length, drives it towards deep extra cover for a couple of runs
goodish length on the off, gets on the back foot and turns it towards midwicket
angling in towards middle and leg, tries to work it square, gets an inside edge onto the pads
back of a length and he ducks under that one
floating it on the off, tries to reverse-sweep it, plays it onto his pads, the pressure builds
takes it from outside off and sweeps it towards square leg
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and punches it past midwicket for a couple of runs, well run because it takes a while for the fielder in the deep to get to it
reverse-swept towards short third man for a single
pushes it off the front foot towards deep midwicket for a single
turns it off the back foot past midwicket for a single

run-out appeal, turns it towards square leg and rushes for a single, Behardien gets across from midwicket, collects and throws down the stumps at the striker's end, was he in? Replays show Malik was well in, the South Africans appeared quite confident there
bowled it on a good length, gets forward and pushes it towards the bowler

Malik goes, Pakistan are sinking here, Tsotso bowls that full on the off, might have been the slower ball, pushed it straight into the hands of Kleinveldt at mid-off, loose shot, much like the way Jamshed got out
defended solidly by Afridi, gets forward and taps it towards cover
beaten, got it to move away after pitching, bowled it at 130.4kmph, Afridi fished for it and it just went past te outside edge
Afridi gets across to that one and works it through square leg for a single to keep strike
Afridi gets on the back foot and pushes it towards long-on
gets outside the line to that one and sweeps it straight to square leg
finds the gap, converts it into a full toss and sweeps it hard through square leg to the boundary
four more, looping in towards middle and Misbah sweeps that one too, strikes it uppishly, Amla's there it square leg but this one has been struck well wide of him
swings and misses, tossed up outside off, Misbah was looking to hit it past midwicket, missed it
prepares for a reverse-sweep, plays it straight to short third man
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and pushes it to the bowler
gets on the back foot and gets a bit of a leading edge to that one, played towards extra cover
that's the Afridi we know, made room and swung it hard miles over the deep square leg boundary, deserved a 12
Afridiiiiiiiiiiiiiii, full toss and he takes full toll, moves away and hammers that over deep midwicket, disappeared into the second tier
gets on the back foot, turns it wide of square leg for a single
in the channel outside off stump, he leaves it alone to the keeper
defended watchfully, angling in towards middle and that's played back gently to the bowler
swings and misses, a bit of width and he looked to smack that over midwicket but failed, missed it
dropped it short and he mistimed the pull there, got it high on the bat, quick delivery and it landed safe behind midwicket, just the single, 145kmph
almost dragged it on, short of a length outside off, tried to play it past point, got an inside edge to the keeper
short of a good length, took his bottom hand off as he played it down towards third man for a single
straying on the pads, that's been flicked away towards deep square leg for a single
Afridi times that well, drives it off the front foot wide of deep midwicket for a couple of runs
the right length for Afridi, pitched up, he made room and absolutely smashed that over the long-off boundary, that's been caught in the crowd
full toss, that's chipped in the direction of deep midwicket for a single
Misbah's turn to go over the top, reasonable about of width there and he can expand to smash that over extra cover
gets across to work it past square leg for a single
slower legcutter, Afridi gets on the back foot and pushes it into the off side for a quick single
angling in towards middle, pushed towards cover for a quick single
fullish outside off, gets outside the line to play it wide of mid-on for a single
ooh, short of a good length, Afridi was cramped for room there, tried to open the face and missed
on a length, gets across and drives it wristily in front of deep midwicket for a well-run couple
tries to drag that from outside off, misses, short ball and Afridi was looking to hit it square, didn't make contact
slower one, bowled at 118.9kmph, clipped towards square leg for a quick single
went for it, slightly short on middle and leg, tried to swing it over square leg, missed, went just over the stumps

top-edge, slower one bowled short on middle, tried to smack it over square leg, got a top edge and over short fine, Steyn gives chase but the foot makes contact with the ropes as he slides and drags it back in, that's a boundary
a couple of runs down the ground, Afridi made room and the bowler followed him, struck well wide of long-on for a couple
down the leg side, Afridi moved across to play it fine but that was down the leg side anyway, a wide called
wristily done, takes it from the off stump and whips it through square leg into the deep for two more
slower one and he saw that well did Afridi, smashed it flat over the short deep square leg boundary
a wide down the leg side, a misdirected short ball
played it gently into the leg side for a single
low full toss, driven hard towards long-on for a single
slower one bowled short outside off, runs that down to third man for a single
clears mid-off, mistimed, the bottom-hand came off as he played it, short of a length and he looked to flat-bat that, two more
reaches his half-century, a whirlwind innings, taps it towards point for a single
chopped behind point for a single, short of a good length
ooh, that was well bowled, took off from a good length and rapped him hard on the finger, a touch too quick for Afridi there
slower one bowled short outside off, pulled through to deep square leg for a single
aiming at the stumps, full, Afridi makes room to strike that through off, gets a thick inside edge into the leg side
Misbah goes! McLaren bowls that full outside off, Misbah had already made a bit of room and had to chase it, got a thin edge through to de Villiers
yorker length on the off, digs it out into the off side
bowled on a good length, rocks forward and defends it towards cover
slower bouncer, called a wide for height, too high there
angling in towards middle, pushes it back to the bowler, the Powerplays are done
No stopping Afridi, he has an injured thumb, plenty of width there to free his arms and that's been smashed over the long-off boundary
innovative this time, gets it from outside off and sweeps it through square leg for four more, "that's yours" he tells AB, who has mastered such shots over time
gets on the back foot and pushes it down the ground for a single
Wahab nicely guides that one down to third man for a single
gave himself way too much room there, Tsotso bowled it wide of off and Afridi couldn't reach it
slightly short outside off, gets it wide of Steyn at short third for a single
short ball and Afridi has pulled that fiercely over square leg for a one bounce four, middled it
upset with himself for having missed out there, length ball outside off and again, he made too much room there to reach it
bad ball and that's into the stands, ooos and aahs from the crowd here, full toss on middle and that's been sent into the crowd behind deep midwicket

bowled'im! But hang on, they're calling to check if it's a no-ball and it is one! Low full toss outside off, almost yorker length, got an inside edge on that one as he went for the drive and the stump was knocked out of the ground, could have been a decisive blow that, Afridi stays on
a full toss outside off and Afridi leaves that alone, it stays a freehit, it's been called a wide

is that the biggest six hit in South Africa? On a length and Afridi gets stuck into that one, he's middled that superbly, that's out of the ground, out of the stadium, McLaren has gifted him a length ball and that's been smashed over the roof
slower bouncer just outside off and he leaves that one to the keeper
full toss, struck towards mid-off and there's a misfield, they sneak in a single and Afridi keeps the strike

dropped, how costly will that prove? Smith has put that down, Pakistan need some luck and they are getting a lot of it here, Afridi lofted it over extra cover, Smith ran to his right in the deep, a lazy effort there as he tried to catch that, should go down as a drop, missed and it bounced past him and over the ropes
Afridi, you beauty, takes it from outside off and sweeps that cheekily between square leg and short fine leg for four more

gone! Is he? That's a full toss outside off and it's struck straight to long-off, not a front-foot no ball, but Afridi wanted it checked for height. Was it above the waist? It was fine, he was down the wicket as well and he was reaching forward, straight to long-off where McLaren takes the catch, a superb innings but it may not be enough for Pakistan
bowled it full outside off, tries to guide it to third man, misses
a thick outside edge towards third man, guided but not as fine as he intended, a couple more to the score
yorker length on the off, digs it out towards point
flighted on middle and that's been pushed back to the bowler
shortish on middle, turns it behind square for a single
sweeps that one towards short fine, can't pick up the single, it's not there
floating it on the off, defends it just on the side of the stumps, a bit of an inside edge there
goes for the sweep, gets a top edge but it lands safe in the midwicket region
Ajmal takes it from middle and paddles it fine for a couple of runs
bowled on a length, swings hard, gets an inside edge onto the pads
short outside off and he goes hard over midwicket, doesn't connect again

pushed into the leg side in front of the bowler, Kleinveldt collects and tries to throw down the stumps at the striker's end, misses, hits AB instead, they get another run on the overthrow, was a missed run-out
smashed, pitched up and that's been drilled through extra cover for a boundary, still some fight left in Pakistan
short of a good length outside off, tries to guide it towards third man, misses
guides that wide of slip down towards third man for a single
floating it outside off, taps it towards point, no run there
flighted on the off, played into the leg side for a single
angling it towards middle, gets forward and turns it into the vacant midwicket region for a single
shortish on the off, punches it towards extra cover
slower through the air outside off, knocked towards point
shortish on the off, turns it through square leg for a single
short on the off, Wahab goes for the pull, gets it high on the bat and lands in front of mid-on, they pick a single
shortish on the off, knocked away into the leg side, no run on offer there
shortish outside off, crunched into the deep off the back foot for a single
shortish, goes for the pull through square leg, is struck high on the thigh, Ajmal wants the single but Wahab decides against it
slower bouncer on middle and Wahab ducks under that one
that's a flat six, flat-batted hit, short outside off and Kleinveldt has been smashed hard over the long-on boundary, Wahab isn't giving up
tossed up on middle, turns it through square leg for a single
flat on the off, gets across and defends it into the leg side
slog-swept, tossed up outside off and he thrashes that between long-on and deep midwicket
flighted outside off and that's been driven towards extra cover
flatter on the off, drops it down towards point
slightly short outside off, that's been cut towards point
short of a length outside off, chops it wide of point for a quick single
short of a length outside off, goes for a cut but doesn't connect
slower one, pulled hard wide of deep midwicket for a couple of runs
full toss and he'll feel he missed out there, got an inside edge onto the pads
short on middle, pulled a little wide of long-on for a single
slides that one down the leg side, called a wide
shortish outside off, punched off the back foot to Amla at deep point for a single
slower one outside off, pushed straight to point
angling in towards middle, flicked away to deep square leg for a single
short outside off, slapped towards deep cover for a single
pitched on a length, pushed straight to extra cover, Wahab was struggling to make it back to the non-striker's end when Peterson threw it from extra cover
slower one on the off stump, played back gently to the bowler
flicked away towards deep square leg to keep the strike
well taken by Kleinveldt at mid-off, pitched up and Ajmal struck that clean through the line, mid-off was inside the circle, Kleinveldt moved to his right and pouched a sharp one, that was travelling
yorker length outside off, dug out towards cover, no single there
shortish on the off, tapped away towards point for a single
targeting the blockhole, this time on middle, moves away and digs it out back towards the bowler
dropped that short outside off, Wahab had a big swing but did not make contact
lovely scoop from Wahab, turns out to be a low full toss, he shuffles, bends low and scoops that over short fine leg
short of a good length, punched on the up towards deep cover for a single
he's still fighting is Wahab, short outside off, pulled, didn't time it too well but it had enough on it to beat deep midwicket to the ropes
slightly short, slapped towards long-on for a single
slightly short on middle, pushes it off the back foot wide of midwicket for a single
slower one bowled on a length on the off, driven down to long-on for a single
slices that one in the direction of third man for just the single
Junaid goes after Kleinvedlt, comes down the track and smacks that length ball over mid-off for a boundary, 300 up for Pakistan
slides that one down the leg side and it's called a wide
makes room to cream that one down the ground, misses, that didn't miss the off stump by much
yorker length, just managed to get some bat to it, got it down in time and got an inside edge, just wide of the stumps
on a length, gets it wide of midwicket for a single, applause from the Pakistan dressing room, they still sense a chance here
wow, Wahab had shaped up to scoop that, ended up missing it as it was a touch too wide, was struck on the pad
low full toss, pushes it into the deep on the off side for a single, good comeback from Kleinvedlt after being struck for a boundary
on a length outside off and he wanted to dispatch that over long-off, missed
short outside off, slaps that one wide of extra cover, just the single there
short of a length outside off, leaves that alone to the keeper
short on middle, goes for the pull but misses
too quick as he tries to whip that into the leg side, Junaid gets a leading edge and Steyn snaps an easy return catch, South Africa are wrapping this up
it's bowled straight on middle, defended from the crease into the leg side
Wahab keeps the fight on, fullish on the off, made a bit of room and sliced it through point for a boundary
low full toss, refuses the single, drills it down the ground to long-off
quick outside off, fullish and Wahab reaches for it but can't get to it

missed run-out, low full toss on leg stump, tried to clip it square, went for the run not knowing where the ball was, McLaren ran in and tried to under-arm flick that onto the stumps, missed it, whacks the stumps out of frustration
full toss outside off and Wahab misses on the attempted cut
another full toss, this time it's just guided to point for a single
superb yorker from Kleinveldt, targeting leg stump and Wahab, who's played a spirited innings, failed to bring his bat down in time, leg stump was knocked out
